SELECT role_id,role_req,role_name,role_type,role_desc,status,create_time,create_user, upate_time,update_user,comments FROM t_user_role where 1=1
and role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
AND role_type =#{roleType}
order by role_type

SELECT a.role_id, a.role_req, a.role_name, a.role_type, a.role_desc, a.status, a.create_time, a.create_user, a.upate_time, a.update_user, a.comments FROM t_user_role a left join t_user_user_role_relation b on a.role_id = b.role_id where a.status = 1 AND b.status = 1 AND b.user_id=#{userId}
